(:action hunt ; Universal hunt action
  :parameters (?actor - entity ?target - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (available ?actor) ; The actor (NPC or person) is available
    (or 
      (and (at ?actor ?target) (not (covered ?target))) ; For paths that need to be covered
      (and (found ?target) (not (tested ?target))) ; For food that needs testing
      (and (at ?actor ?target) (not (grooved ?target))) ; For wood that needs grooving
    )
  )
  :effect (and 
    (or 
      (covered ?target) ; The path becomes covered
      (tested ?target)  ; The food becomes tested
      (grooved ?target) ; The wood becomes grooved
    )
    ;; Additional conditional effects for specific tasks
    (when (and (found ?target) (not (tested ?target))

(:action carve ; Perform a carving action to modify an object
  :parameters (?person - person ?tool - tool ?material - material)
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?person ?material)
    (at ?person ?tool)
    (not (modified ?material))
  )
  :effect (modified ?material)
)
